description: DINKAR JOSHI has to his credit 120 books written in Gujarati. Several of his books are translated and published in different regional languages including English. His writings cover both social and spiritual areas of life and include the research work on Lord Krishna, Lord Buddha, epics like Mahabharat and Ramayan, biographical novels based on the life of distinguished personalities like the Gujarati poet Narmad, Mohammed Ali Jinnah (the creator of Pakistan), Rabindranath Tagore (a Nobel laureate Indian poet), and also on Lord Buddha.
name: Dinkar Joshi
